_header: The soft morrow and the lusty April
Title(s): The Romans of Lancelot of the Laik
_description: The Romans of Lancelot of the Laik — 3484 lines in couplets

CULKk15.First Lines:
The soft morow ande the lustee AperillThe wynt ser the Stormys in
                    exill…
CULKk15.Last Lines:
…[A]nd galiot he can his folk exortbeseching them to be of
                    good comfort
